summary: Pandora, the land of Avatars is facing trouble. When Alduin came back not only did he summon dragons to the whole of Nirn he also summoned them to the moon of Pandora of which Avatars reside.
descriptionHtml:
Pandora, the land of Avatars is facing trouble. When Alduin came back not only did he summon dragons to the whole of Nirn he also summoned them to the moon of Pandora of which Avatars reside. The Navi (Avatar race) have heard about you being the dragonborn and seek for you to put an end to their misery. Upon arriving to Pandora (which won\\\\\\\'t be easy) you will find many people wanting your help aswell as shops selling unique items not to be found anywhere in Skyrim so start a completley different adventure today with Dillan\\\\\\\'s Pandora Mod.

BEGIN YOUR ADVENTURE BY SPEAKING TO THE NAVI COMMANDER IN RIFTEN MARKETPLACE WHO WILL ASSIST YOU IN GETTING TO PANDORA (He\\\\\\\'s blue, you\\\\\\\'ll see him.)

Notes -
Does not require any DLC to be installed
This is an pre-alpha version so its very limited
Make sure you check back on this page often for developments

Changelog-

PREALPHA 0.02 ~ You can now ask the Navi Commander \"WHY ARE YOU BLUE!?!\"

PREALPHA 0.01 ~ First release, only function is Navi Commander appearing in Riften.
author: Dilzy2
